awards.text: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Pope Julius is eager to leave behind works by which he will be remembered. To this end he cajoles Michelangelo into painting the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel. When not on the battlefield uniting Italy, the Pope nags Michelangelo to speed up his painful work on the frescoes.
plot: The biographical story of Michelangelo's troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II.
title: The Agony and the Ecstasy
writers: Irving Stone (based on the novel: "The Agony and the Ecstasy" by)
